review: I got mine as a gift last year and didn't really use it much at first, but then more apps enabled casting, higher quality content became more common (turn it on when YouTube is live streaming the Coachella music festival) and it soon became very handy to have around.  Sure it doesn't add anything new to your connected tv and/or blu-ray player, but it's so much easier to use.  YouTube, WatchESPN, and Vudu are probably the three I use most.  Now I've bought one as a gift for someone else.
author: Lori

review: I wish I could give this a better review!!!!!!! After hearing all the great things about this product, I went out on Black Friday to purchase it and bring it home to find it won't connect with my home wifi. Why won't it connect you might ask? Because this thing needs to be within a certain distance of a router with zero interference. 10-15 feet precisely. My set up for my entertainment is on the floor below the router, but directly below it. It wouldn't connect, try after try and after discovering that you have to be borderline next to the router for this damn thing to work! I am extremely upset that this product doesn't have the capability to work throughout my house, you know like my phone and google tablet do, but I won't buy this product again until they make better! by far the biggest letdown by a product ever!
author: Stephen
